Summary: VERY LARGE, 2 dull white lights, black w/ rough texture.
divs: sighting detailsi stepped outside to have a cig. i very often look at the sky since 7\30\07. the truth is i have been ridiculed by town people since 07 and its been rough.this time i will tell only in a report like this, i know the truth and that matters most. i saw a giant black triangle w\ 2 dull whites lights near 2 of its corners. it approached from the south, heading north almost directly overhead. it was at the least a couple footall fields in size. it traveled very slow and maybe 2-300ft high. it traveled flat end fist, not point first,w\ two dull white lights near each corner. when it was almost overhead, one of those light got very bright and then receded back as it was. thats when i saw for a split second from the illumination that the texture was not smooth, but appeared rough and it kind of glittered a little bit, like sunshine would on some black granite rock. it was 100% silent and kept moving slowly north, same alltitude and speed, till out of sight. ( the 2 dull white light were round in shape) and thats it.
